description: Refactored an internal developer tool for Homes.com, integrating it into the main platform to automate data decryption, streamline user management, and optimize a favorites database, reducing developer hours by 50%. Developed automated tests using Selenium to improve search results, enhancing testing efficiency and reducing release cycles. Contributed to SEO optimization to improve Lighthouse performance scores.

company: Women in Computing @ UC San Diego
description: Organized and led project teams for 60+ members each quarter, focusing on web development. Developed a 10-week activity plan and conducted weekly technical workshops on HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and APIs. Delivered workshops on interview prep, resume writing, and Figma to enhance members' skills and career readiness.
